product_name: Aventura Collin Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soft and incredibly comfortable with just the right amount of detail, the Aventura Collin tank top has all the features of a wardrobe essential. Lightweight cotton jersey is soft next to skin and features a touch of stretch. Alternating sheer and opaque horizontal stripes add detail without being distracting. Aventura Collin tank top features a relaxed fit for all-day comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Soft and incredibly comfortable with just the right amount of detail, the Aventura Collin tank top has all the features of a wardrobe essential.
